Plot: Ronnie BoDean is a larger-than-life outlaw with a short fuse and probably some loose screws. Uncouth and suffering from a mean hangover, he struggles to babysit his jailed neighbor's precocious kids.
Title: Ronnie BoDean
Writer: Tvli Jacob, Steven Judd, Ken Kristensen
Actors: Wes Studi, Preston Simpson, Georgia Seres, Briana Looby
